assertions.assertion: Pass in an invalid SessionId. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_SESSION.
Get all of the DRT entries in all in each domain. Expected return: SA_OK.
Pass in an invalid EntryId. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_NOT_PRESENT.
Pass in a NULL pointer for DrtEntry. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_PARAMS.
Pass in a NULL pointer for NextEntryId. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_PARAMS.
Pass in a SAHPI_LAST_ENTRY for EntryId. Expected return: SA_ERR_HPI_INVALID_PARAMS.
